hadiths.text: Ibn Umar narrated that :Allah's Messenger said: "The beginning of the time for Salat is pleasing to Allah, and the end of its time is pardoned by Allah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْوَقْتِ الأَوَّلِ مِنَ الْفَضْلِ
chapter.eng-name: Virtue Of Performing Salat at the Beginning Of Its Prescribed Time
